entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • X509Certificate2 Issuer is empty on Linux in netcoreapp3.1 #86679
  • JIT-EE interface clean up (tracking issue) #86672
    Future
  • Where should I reach out about publishing a new patch for System.Text.Encoding? #86671
  • Crossgen2 solution in the VS doesn't build in release mode complaining about missing ILCompiler.Diagnostics module #86670
    8.0.0
  • JIT: More elaborate store forwarding patterns with physical promotion #86665
    Future
  • System.Net.Http NuGet Package Missing README File #86667
  • Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection NuGet Package Missing README File #86663
  • COM interface derivation chain for 3+ interfaces doesn't generate shadowing and vtables correctly #86662
    8.0.0
  • Missing NuGet package README file #86661
  • Wasm.Build.Tests timeouts while waiting for the web server #86658
    8.0.0
  • Configuration source generator broken when not supplying BinderOptions #86654
    8.0.0
  • ConfigurationBindingGenerator does not work unless Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.Abstractions is referenced #86653
    8.0.0
  • Satellite assembly support in NativeAOT #86651
  • Trimming and extensions compatibility design – discussion #86649
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json: Deserialise object #86646
  • [browser][MT] Memory growth on worker could cause failure #86642
    8.0.0
  • `double.Parse` with `NumberStyles.Currency` Fails to Parse Strings with Non-Breaking Spaces #86641
  • Mono EventPipe code in ep_rt_temp_path_get has an off by 1 issue #86640
  • Find out exact ordering of hiragana/katakana letters in native apple platforms #86636
  • Trim analyzer doesn't see members on open generic type #86633
  • Make a pass over libraries wrt function pointers breaking change #86630
    8.0.0
  • Linq expression interpreter doesn't handle function pointers #86629
    8.0.0
  • MakeGenericXXX apis don't check for function pointers #86628
    8.0.0
  • Trim analyzer should defend against endless loops in analysis #86627
  • Trim analyzer handling of multi-value should not use HashSet #86626
  • [wasm] System.Memory tests failing with AOT running on V8 - `RuntimeError: table index is out of bounds` at `corlib_wrapper_delegate_invoke_System_Func_2_T_REF_TResult_REF_invoke_callvirt_TResult_T_T_REF ` #86621
    8.0.0
  • SerialPort is not supported on Android ? #86619
  • [7.0] WasmTestOnBrowser END OF WORK ITEM LOG: Command timed out, and was killed #86615
  • [Tracking] Decide if the tags order matter when creating meter or instrument #86614
    8.0.0
  • [7.0] CI failure in ios arm64 mono: The code signature version is no longer supported. Could not install the application. #86613

Closed

  • NativeAOT compile with FSharp get broken in net8.0.100-preview.4 #86676
  • Improve the Kerberos testing infrastructure #71453
    Future
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.EventLogReaderTests.CastToEventLogRecord_NotNull #78618
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProviderMetadataTests.SourceDoesNotExist_Throws #78617
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce DI friendly IMeter<T> for modern services #77514
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json incremental source generator performance issues #68353
    8.0.0
  • System.Drawing.Common gets pulled it all projects using System.Runtime.Caching #86488
    8.0.0
  • ComInterfaceGenerator generates cleanup stage for stateless marshalled parameters when it shouldn't #85795
  • Abberviated Month values for en-AU culture appear incorrect. #86643
  • Improve debugging experience of Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration #86550
    Future
  • SslStress build fails on Windows #84800
    8.0.0
  • Code Cleanup: Remove OSX 10.14 compatibility code #60138
    Future
  • Upcoming OpenSSL change is likely going to cause failing unit tests #41021
    Future
  • Jiterpreter performance issues around Dictionary and GenericEqualityComparer #82948
    8.0.0
  • [7.0] Installer build failure: HostActivation Tests in coreclr windows_x86 & coreclr Linux_musl_x64 #86518
  • [API Proposal]: Add support for skipping visibility checks with AssemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicAssembly #85020
  • Incorrect RequiresDynamicCode attribute on System.Type.GetEnumValues #86585
    8.0.0
  • [mono][linux][x64] crash in ep_buffer_manager_write_event #84257
  • https://github.com/Boxter187 #86623
  • CoreCLR breaks the ECMA spec (I.12.3.2.1) with ldsflda for custom types #62784
    Future
  • ChineseLunisolarCalendar gives wrong month #86620
  • [API Proposal] Make System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator constructor protected #86110
    8.0.0
  • Consider decomposing `GetElement(memory, ...)` into equivalent nodes #86345
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Print detailed comments for emitIns_R_AI in asm (targeting NativeAOT) #86677
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump main version to Preview 6 #86675
    area-Infrastructure
  • StreamOnSqlBytes Read/Write on Spans #86674
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Use the BannedApiAnalyzer instead of the LinqPoison mechanism to ban Linq in the managed type system #86673
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Unify Roslyn testing SDK version across the repo #86669
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add newly introduced modifiers to our csharp_preferred_modifier_order editorconfig #86668
    area-Infrastructure
  • Implement byval-out marshalling for unmanaged->managed #86666
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Fix crashing bug in StringDecoder.decode when accessing SharedArrayBuffer from different JavaScript realm #86664
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Adjust physical promotion heuristics #86660
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • QUIC ALPN list narrowing down scenario test #86659
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Use `u8` literals in `ManagedTextSection`. #86657
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Handle event pipe environment variable configuration and output to file on Windows #86656
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Upgrading SpanHelpers with Vector512 #86655
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Improving HelloiOS sample for NativeAOT to be testable with runtime packs #86652
    NO-MERGE, os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • add nuget.projectmodel to version.details #86650
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix a bug in type hierarchy marking in the trimmer #86635
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Pass SIMD type variables using SIMD registers #86634
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • JIT: Follow related intervals for single-reg LIR temp intervals #86632
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][debugger] Don't pass uninitialized context to debugger #86625
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #86617
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Move to new osx test queue for ios devices #86648
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] Move to new osx test queue for ios devices #86647
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Metrics APIs Additions #86567
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • Remove STJ dependency on IncrementalValuesProvider.Collect() #86616
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [wasi] Remove DotNetCoreWeb from ProjectCapability #86639
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 8.0.0
  • Avoid calling Encoding.GetBytes when Vector128 is not hardware accelerated #85267
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Dogfood ComInterfaceGenerator in crossgen2 #84643
    NO-MERGE, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Only call Free in unmanaged->managed stubs when ownership has been transfered to the callee #86415
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Fix possible stack overflow in TotalOrderIeee754Comparer #86593
    area-System.Numerics
  • Improve Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration debugging #86624
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • JIT: Use unsigned native return types for small structs #86631
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix assert failure in grow_heap_segment in no GC region. #86644
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Dynamic heap count #86245
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Attempt to devirtualize call if we have type information about `this` #85528
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [6.0-staging] Disable DllImportSearchPathsTest in mobile #86576
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix Incorrect RequiresDynamicCode attribute message #86602
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][AOT] Enabled tests which fail to JIT compile during AOT #86581
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [browser] Turn webcil off for .NET < 8.0 #86505
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Unreachable filter end #86492
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Fix endless loop in illink analyzer #86449
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Allow overbudget for small methods #86473
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add note about transient pointers to ECMA augments #86622
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Abstract out System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator #86594
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update GetElement and ToScalar to lower IND, LCL_FLD, and LCL_VAR specially #86400
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] No longer discard jiterp inference information when crossing a branch #86611
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [6.0] Remove centos 8 images #86478
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [7.0] Remove centos 8 images #86477
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [7.0] Missing version number bump #86599
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Clone files on OSX-like platforms when possible, instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • Adapt Tarjan generic cycle detector for use in Crossgen2 #71426
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Implement stream-based ZipFile ExtractToDirectory and CreateFromDirectory method overloads #85491
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Up Minimum CMake Version to 3.20 #86530
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector128/256/512.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Tar: Improve unseekable stream handling #84279
    area-System.Formats.Tar, 8.0.0
  • Guarded devirtualization: multiple type checks #86551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2187003 #86535
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use cinv and cneg instead of csel when possible #84926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [API Proposal]: Add overload for EventSource primitives #83751
    api-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Add support for deferred failures during AOT compilation #86554
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Stop setting HelixResultsDestinationDir #86413
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add Native AOT iOS perf scenarios #85317
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add Support For Multiplexing `System.Diagnostics.Metrics` for `Dotnet Monitor` and `Dotnet Counters` #86504
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • [mono][tests] Run Mono iOS sample on Helix #86578
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Attempt to fix unfailing helix test run when testResults.xml are missing #86342
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add get AppContext properties diagnostic IPC command #86610
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Initial work to enable EventPipe in Linux #86226
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Save 260k in InitValueNumStoreStatics #85945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Making mono_inst_name less misleading #83570
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [browser] threads cleanup #86278
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • SequenceReader performance; elide bounds checks and book-keeping #82765
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization implement compare native function #85965
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Fold const WithElement to CNS_VEC #86212
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow the user to control the MaxVectorTBitWidth #85551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • [debugger][mono] Block multithreading debugger failures #86501
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, area-Threading-mono
  • Fixing the InstructionSetDesc implications #86486
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Add PipeOptions.FirstPipeInstance enum value #83936
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Use dn_vector_t instead of GArray in a few places #84027
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix invalid "double.ToString" behavior with two section separators #85565
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] marshal-ilgen is dropped when not required #86035
    NO-MERGE, area-Build-mono
  • Disable mark list optimization if we hit a per region mark list overflow #86508
    area-GC-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Read public GC options if available #86068
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` normalization. #85510
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [ios][wasm] Bump to ICU-72 #84849
    NO-MERGE, area-Build-mono
  • [browser] Fix fingerprinting of relinked dotnet.js during build #86048
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix branch #86482
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #86358
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][aot] Use an mrgctx for all gshared methods on iOS #86583
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, size-reduction, 8.0.0
  • [mono][infra] Upgrade iOS performance queue to OSX 13 #86574
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Warn if StringMarshalling doesn't match base and warn if base interface cannot be generated #86467
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [NativeAOT] Cache some allocations when invoking Linq.Expression lambdas. #86607
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-23
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Exception handling: outstanding tasks #2169

PullRequests

Merged

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge runtime to 17 May 2023 #2283
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement two-pass exception handling #2284

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NETSDKE2E][Loc]With .NET 8 preview 5 SDK installed, the help description for "--sc, --self-contained" option is not consistent with EN. #32753

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #32773
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.14.1 to 20.0.0 in /eng/dependabot #32767
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies
  • Read workload sets in workload manifest reader #32766
    Area-Workloads
  • Containers: rename "Docker daemon" to "local registry". #32751
    untriaged

Merged

  • Port some of the auth changes from 7.0.4xx #32772
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the manifests from the rollback file in the overlay target rather than the yml #32745
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add back legacy JS hot reload function #32738
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update dependabot to run on 4xx #31837
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Make GeneratePublishDependencyFile incremental #32305
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Enable EventSourceSupport in ASP.NET Native AOT apps #32538
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Disable dotnet.js fingerprinting for .NET 8 #31829
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #32730
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.14.1 to 20.0.0 in /eng/dependabot #32713
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx
  • Interactive mode proof of concept #30832
    Area-dotnet new
  • Add details command #31743
    untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32724
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal] Extend with expression to anonymous type #3530

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add ExternalAccess project to give DefaultAnalyzerAssemblyLoader to dotnet format #68304
  • Automatic formatting inconsistent when pressing Enter within braces #68303
  • 'CSharpIntroduceParameterCodeRefactoringProvider' encountered an error and has been disabled #68301

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unexercised C# binaires from VB OptProf test profiling #68302
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Merge RecoverableText and WeaklyCachedRecoverableValueSource into one type #68295
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix offered options for 'use primary constructor' #68296
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Support 'foreach' for inline arrays. #68297
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Expect mapped paths in InterceptsLocationAttribute #68242
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make ConstantTextAndVersionSource no longer a ValueSource. #68298
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add new (hopefully easier) telemetry mechanism #68261
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add FilterTree/FilterSpan API on remaining analysis contexts #68052
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Performance-Scenario-Diagnostics
  • Add support for ref returning methods and properties in `With` statement. #68203
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Locals and Returns, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Follow-ups to improve the experience when using Blazor Server and WebAssembly components together #48396
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Missing package README file #48392
  • model binding to one class doesn't work as expected and documented #48391
  • Issues using Blazor Multithreading within iframes #48390
  • [API Proposal]: Provide async callback for ClientCertificateValidation in Kestrel #48384
  • Two Map* methods on the same source line cause InvalidCastException with Request Delegate Generator #48383
  • Do not emit unused code with Request Delegate Generator #48381
  • Application using Request Delegate Generator fails to start with KeyNotFoundException #48379
  • Request Delegate Generator fails to compile endpoint with Uri? parameter with CS8600 errors #48378
  • Request Delegate Generator code counts as user code for code coverage #48376
  • Quarantine ResponseCachingMiddlewareTests.FinalizeCacheHeadersAsync_ResponseValidity_UseExpiryIfAvailable #48373
    Test failures

Closed

  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.NewtonsoftJson Package Missing README File #48394
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.EntityFrameworkCore Missing Package README File #48393
  • Ability to run Blazor Server and WebAssembly components side-by-side in the same document #48032
    8.0-preview5
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.Tests.HostingApplicationTests.IHttpActivityFeatureIsPopulated #35142
    Test failures
  • Accept-Language Header is not validated by RFC 9110 specification #48318
  • app.UseRouting must be called after `UsePathBase` #48370
  • Use versioned python3 command in scripts #48221
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Enable JSON format output for `user-jwts list` #45141
    7.0.x
  • [Question] .NET6 Minimal API model binding error handling and Environment. #48355

PullRequests

Created

  • Add test retries to FinalizeCacheHeadersAsync_ResponseValidity_UseExpiryIfAvailable #48389
    area-infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2186826 #48387
    area-mvc
  • DO NOT REVIEW Add a trimming test that always fails for experimental purposes #48386
    needs-area-label, area-hosting
  • Update project resolution and app settings writes in `dotnet user-jwts` #48385
    area-commandlinetools, feature-userjwts
  • Add [GeneratedCode] for more RDG output #48377
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Rename ASP.NET Core metrics #48375
    blocked, area-runtime, area-signalr

Merged

  • [Blazor] Update discovery APIs and automatically configure the endpoints based on the discovered RenderModes #48283
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview5
  • Enable Blazor Server and WebAssembly components to run in the same document #48294
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview5
  • Add a test confirming that X509Certificate is trimmed #48295
    area-hosting, 8.0-preview5
  • Quarantine ResponseCachingMiddlewareTests.FinalizeCacheHeadersAsync_ResponseValidity_UseExpiryIfAvailable #48374
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview5
  • Unquarantine `IHttpActivityFeatureIsPopulated` #48371
    area-infrastructure, area-hosting, 8.0-preview5
  • DisableInferBodyFromParameters in RDG. #48269
    area-runtime, feature-rdg, 8.0-preview5
  • [blazor] Read appsettings loaded by the runtime into the VFS #48326
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview5
  • [Blazor] Add new Blazor Web Template #48285
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview5
  • Try updating to python3 #48367
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • HttpContext debugger display tweaks and fixes #48321
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview5

Updated

  • Add dependency injection support for object pools #48217
    area-runtime
  • [Blazor] Source generator to create the discovery information at compile time. #48284
    area-blazor
  • Update JSInProcessObjectReference.cs #48287
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [SignalR] Seamless Reconnect #48338
    area-signalr
  • Migrate RDF-specific tests to shared infrastructure (part 2) #48369
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Updated the AddPolicyRegistry extension methods to use TryAdd and TryAddEnumerable internally #47821
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • use new System.Text.Ascii APIs, remove internal helpers #48368
    area-runtime
  • Update SDK #48252
    area-infrastructure
  • Improve performance of output cache #48328
    feature-middleware, area-perf, feature-output-caching
  • Issue #45096 Toru_Watanbe #48352
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Uses Fallback When Without Repository #48103
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Windows] WebView EvaluateJavaScriptAsync returns an incorrect result #15233
    Backlog
  • Using a Brush in the App resources causes memory leak #15231
    .NET 8
  • PopupPage: Screen goes black outside frame on iOS #15230
  • A11y_.NETCore_RecipesAppRecipesSearch_Searchbymealtypesection_Orientation: At landscape orientation "Click here to view full recipe" and "Add to my recipes" controls are not visible. #15229
    .NET 8
  • A11y_.NETCore_RecipesAppRecipesSearch_Searchbymealtypesection_Resize: After resizing the font size to largest name of the "Meal types" present under 'Search by meal type' are not visible. #15228
    .NET 8
  • SwipeView should Notify on Closing/Closed state. #15227
    Backlog
  • A11y_.NETCore_RecipesAppMyRecipesEdit_EditRecipe_Screen Reader: Talkback focus is not moving correctly when we try to edit in "Ingredients" and "Recipe". #15226
    .NET 8
  • Obsolete ImageSource.FromResource #15225
    .NET 8
  • The Blazor MAUI app crashes on Windows when an InputFile is used #15224
    .NET 8 Planning

Closed

  • Windows does not show datalist dropdown #15136
    .NET 8 Planning
  • MauiHybrid <datalist> element no longer working #15149
  • Request to add function to Microsoft.Maui.Handlers.EntryHandler. #12276
    Backlog
  • Only the original thread that created a view hierarchy can touch its view #14052
    Backlog
  • Deploying the App in Release Version Crash on Android Physical Device but works if deployed as Debug Version #7860
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Scrollview control not working properly in .Net MAUI (Android) #8427
    Backlog
  • DatePicker displays differently on iOS and Mac #8495
    Backlog
  • [Android] Animated FontSize does not update width and causes text to disappear #8496
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • Use PrependToMapping method to replace Window MapTitle method #15041
  • Fixed Android's StreamImageSourceService.LoadDrawableAsync() #14109
    area/image :framed_picture:
  • Update All (most) BindableProperty XML docs (Backport #14704) #15208
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Crypto.Tink.Android from 1.8.0.1 to 1.9.0 #15206
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • Move Windows and iOS Frame measure and arrange to xplat layer #14987
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • Use AppendToMapping for Focus commands #15040
  • Legacy gallery filtered solutions #15219
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [ios] fix memory leaks in ContentView #15193
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Fixed removing items from the shell causing a crash #15098
    area/shell 🐢
  • Implements Color.Equal() correctly #15218
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [Windows/macOS] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • Add visual testing support, on top of Appium #14999
    area/testing
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Supress CA1861 in migrations files #30961
  • When object repeats itself in lazy loading it is coming null #30960
  • Saving an object with a large number of related children works in EF Core 6 but not in EF Core 7 #30959
  • Consider a related entity loading strategy that uses aggregates dependent collections to a JSON array #30958
  • Obsolete AddAsync and change HiLo to generate IDs at SaveChanges time #30957

PullRequests

Merged

  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.core from 2.1.4 to 2.1.5 #30953
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.1.2 to 8.2.0 #30950
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlite3 from 2.1.4 to 2.1.5 #30951
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_winsqlite3 from 2.1.4 to 2.1.5 #30949
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Normalize Any to Contains instead of vice versa #30956

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-23
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Add a source-build smoke test for native debug symbols #16488
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1224: Build ID 2186824 #16485

  • Remove runtime patch that was addressed #16466
